sokobangame.controller.modes.editmode
Interface MazeObjectEditorDetailer

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrowEditorDetailer, ComboBoxUsingEditorDetailer, CrateEditorDetailer, PlayerEditorDetailer, TargetEditorDetailer, WallEditorDetailer
public interface MazeObjectEditorDetailer

An interface for classes providing object-specific dialog text and tool-bar components for editing a MazeObject in the EditMode. Uses generics for the convenience of its implementations.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getInvalidMoveDialogText()
          The error message to show when the user attempts to move the maze object to an invalid position.
 void populateToolbar(EditMode mode, MazeObject o)
          Add additional options to the toolbar (using mode.addToToolBar) to let the user modify the maze object.
